name: react-intl-miniparse
description: Do a craptacular job of parsing the react-intl templates, so that you can do text  transforms without transforming the template controls

scripts.clean: rimraf -f docs && rimraf -f dist && mkdir docs && npm run rmtmp
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run peg && npm run typescript

author: John Haugeland <stonecypher@gmail.com>
